subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text: It has been compared with {{cog|bo|གཤོར||to count, to measure, to weigh}} by {{zh-ref|Gong (1995)}}. The Old Chinese coda was *''-r'', as preserved in Japanese {{ja-r|算盤|そろばん|abacus}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[count]]; to [[calculate]]; to [[figure]]
# to [[plan]]; to [[arrange]]; to [[design]]
# to [[guess]]; to [[estimate]]; to [[approximate]]
# to [[regard]] as; to [[consider]]
# to [[count]]; to be of [[significance]]
# to [[let]] it [[pass]]; to [[give up]]
# [[finally]]; [[eventually]]
